name: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.
description: Sole foundry for Apple's chips, impacts iPhone/Mac performance.

name: Foxconn
description: Assembles majority of iPhones, affecting shipment and revenue.

name: People’s Republic of China
description: Hosts over 50% of Apple's assembly; policy shifts affect supply.

name: Samsung Electronics
description: Rival and key supplier of OLED displays and memory.

name: Alphabet
description: Android OS and search deal impacts Apple's profits.

name: Qualcomm
description: Supplies 5G/4G modem chips, crucial for iPhone connectivity.

name: U.S. & EU Antitrust Regulators
description: Investigate antitrust issues affecting Apple's margins.

name: Global Smartphone Market Demand
description: Economic factors directly influence Apple's revenue.

name: Broadcom
description: Supplies Wi-Fi/Bluetooth chips; affects iPhone feature launches.

name: App Developer Ecosystem
description: Legal challenges and developer pushback impact App Store revenue.

name: India (Government & Manufacturing/Consumer Market)
description: Tariff policies and smartphone demand shape Apple's growth.

name: Sony
description: Supplies camera sensors, crucial for iPhone differentiation.
